filename.description: Path to the custom topo file (only used with option 5). Cannot be .bin. Use .dat or .inp

topo_flag.description: Topo flag: 0 = no terrain file provided, QUIC-Fire is run with flat terrain, 1 = Gaussian hill, 2 = hill pass, 3 = slope mesa, 4 = canyon, 5 = custom, 6 = half circle, 7 = sinusoid, 8 = cos hill, 9 = terrain is provided via QP_elevation.bin (see Section 2.7), 10 = terrain is provided via terrainOutput.txt, 11 = terrain.dat (firetec)

smoothing_method.description: Smoothing method: 0 = none (default for idealized topo), 1 = Blur, 2 = Davidâ€™s method based on second derivative

smoothing_passes.description: Number of smoothing passes. Real terrain MUST be smoothed.

sor_iterations.description: Number of SOR iteration to define background winds before starting the fire

sor_cycles.description: Number of times the SOR solver initial fields is reset to define background winds before starting the fire

sor_relax.description: SOR overrelaxation coefficient. Only used if there is topo.
